A teenager has relived the horrific moment her finger tip was ripped off after getting it trapped in a fence at Reading Festival.

articles.title: GMB's Ben Shephard in cringe-worthy gaffe as he speaks Spanish to Gino D’Acampo - The Mirror

articles.content:
